review: I am very pleased with my Fire TV purchase.  I purchased this as a Christmas gift for the entire family - this is definitely the future of entertainment.  Also love the streaming music and radio.  The cloud backup for pictures/photographs is also awesome.  I also like the remote control app that you can get on your smartphone in case you misplace the remote - this app allows your phone (mine is a Galaxy Note 4) to function exactly like the physical remote.  I would have given a 5 star rating if I could use the remote to get info/details on a program/show that I might be watching without having to exit out of the show.  Maybe that will be addressed in future upgrades.  However, the benefits far outweigh this one hurdle.
author: Vincent H. Brown

review: My husband and I bought it for us for Christmas. We do really like it, We live in a rural area and my husband likes to listen to talk shows in the day time, We do have DirecTV, Netflix, etc. At first he was not so impressed but I showed him that I already had a list of over 1000 songs in my Prime Music List, over 100 save (for later) movies in my Prime movies, but the big "OK, I'm impressed" from him was when I showed him "Iheart" radio NOW, he can listen to am talk radio, local football games etc! So, I would give it a 5 Star
